networkplugin.name: Aditic (Sofialys)
networkplugin.info_content:
Network Info

The ADITIC brand is a product from Sofialys, the leading mobile advertising and marketing company. Our team has been working for over 6 years in the field of new technologies and advertising and we have leveraged this expertise to develop ADITIC and make it an easy-to-use platform for all of our customers.

Ad Formats

Aditic supports both Banner Ads and Text Ads.

Best Countries

France
